org.kepler.job

Class JobFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.job.JobFactory

  • public class JobFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a factory to store Job objects. The reference to a job is with a String id. This class should be used in Kepler actors instead of the Job class directly, so that job id's can be sent along.

    Author:
    Norbert Podhorszki

      • create

        public static java.lang.String create()
        Create a new job object.
        Returns:
        the unique ID for the job. Use method getJob() to get the Job object itself.

        Return an existing job.
        Returns:

      • remove

        public static boolean remove(java.lang.String jobID)
        Remove an existing job.
        Returns:
        true if such job existed, false otherwise
